# expand(_:)

**Instance Method**

Expands the specified items in the section snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func expand(_ items: [ItemIdentifierType])
```

## Expanding and collapsing items

- **isExpanded(_:)**: Indicates whether the item with the specified identifier is in an expanded state.
- **collapse(_:)**: Collapses the specified items in the section snapshot.

items.description: Indicates whether the item with the specified identifier is in an expanded state.
items.name: isExpanded(_:)

items.description: Collapses the specified items in the section snapshot.
items.name: collapse(_:)

title: expand(_:)
